mapper.insert: insert into chat (user_code, chat_body, insert_date, update_date) values (#{userCode}, #{chatBody}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, user_code as userCode, home_class as homeClass, cur_grade as curGrade, name from user where id = #{id}
select chat_body as chatBody, datediff(update_date, now()) as updateDateDiffCnt, datediff(insert_date, now()) as insertDateDiffCnt, update_date as updateDate from chat

select g.score as score, g.semester_code as semesterCode, g.subject_id as subjectId, g.user_code as userCode, c.user_code as userCode, u.user_code as userCode from grade g left outer join chat c on g.user_code = c.user_code left outer join user u on g.user_code = u.user_code where u.home_class = #{homeClass}
mapper.update: update chat set chat_body = #{chatBody}, update_date = now() where chat_id = #{chatId}
